cultivation_methods.fertilizer: NPK 2:3:2 at 300kg/ha at planting, top dress with LAN at 6 weeks

pest_management.prevention: Crop rotation, early planting, resistant varieties

disease_management.prevention: Use certified seed, crop rotation, avoid monoculture

cultivation_methods.soil_preparation: Fine seedbed, level surface, remove weeds
cultivation_methods.fertilizer: NPK 3:2:1 at 250kg/ha, nitrogen top dressing at tillering

pest_management.prevention: Seed treatment, early planting, resistant cultivars

disease_management.prevention: Resistant varieties, crop rotation, fungicide seed treatment
disease_management.treatment: Fungicide sprays during stem elongation and heading

cultivation_methods.soil_preparation: Deep ploughing, subsoiling for compacted soils
cultivation_methods.irrigation: Essential in areas with <1000mm rainfall, drip or furrow

disease_management.prevention: Disease-free seedcane, resistant varieties, hot water treatment
disease_management.treatment: Remove infected plants, fungicide dips for cuttings

cultivation_methods.soil_preparation: Fine tilth, ensure good contact between seed and soil
cultivation_methods.irrigation: Critical during flowering and pod filling
cultivation_methods.fertilizer: Minimal nitrogen needed (nitrogen-fixing), phosphorus 50kg/ha, inoculation essential

pest_management.prevention: Early planting, crop rotation, trap crops
pest_management.treatment: IPM approach, insecticides when threshold reached

disease_management.prevention: Crop rotation, certified seed, fungicide seed treatment
disease_management.treatment: Fungicide sprays for rust, improve drainage for root rot

pest_management.prevention: Resistant hybrids, early planting, bird scarers

disease_management.prevention: Crop rotation (4 years), resistant hybrids, optimal plant population

cultivation_methods.soil_preparation: Deep ploughing, ridging or bed formation
cultivation_methods.irrigation: Frequent, 500-700mm per season, drip or sprinkler

pest_management.prevention: Certified seed, hilling to cover tubers, crop rotation
pest_management.treatment: Insecticides, pheromone traps for tuber moth

disease_management.prevention: Resistant varieties, certified seed, crop rotation, good drainage
disease_management.treatment: Fungicide program for blights, remove infected plants for bacterial wilt

cultivation_methods.planting_depth_cm: Transplant at same depth as in nursery
cultivation_methods.irrigation: Drip irrigation preferred, consistent moisture critical

pest_management.prevention: Crop rotation, mulching, yellow sticky traps
pest_management.treatment: Bt for hornworm, neem oil, systemic insecticides for whitefly

disease_management.prevention: Resistant varieties, drip irrigation (avoid wetting foliage), crop rotation

cultivation_methods.soil_preparation: Deep ripping, soil analysis essential, drainage critical
cultivation_methods.irrigation: Drip irrigation, deficit irrigation during ripening
cultivation_methods.fertilizer: Based on soil tests, typically low nitrogen, balanced K and P

disease_management.prevention: Canopy management, resistant rootstocks, fungicide program
disease_management.treatment: Sulfur for powdery mildew, copper for downy mildew
